subject: Testing Swing UI without waiting for AWT queue
msgSnippet: Hi, I have a typical Swing Application. When my Swing application comes up, i get a login screen, upon which I have to execute few test cases for checking the
messageBody:
Hi,

I have a typical Swing Application.
When my Swing application comes up, i get a login screen, upon which
I have to execute few test cases for checking the valid login.

Problem I am facing here is, I have a one user defined thread that is
waiting for Input instead of the AWT Event dispatcher thread.

Is there any procedure where I can wait for my own thread instead of
AWT queue for executing my test cases.

Please let me know if the above description is understandable...

Quick response is highly appreciated.

Regards,
Suresh.
